response.overview: Brainy Baby is university studied and published in JOCAM Journal of Children and Media showing children can learn 22X more. Children love to watch Brainy Baby DVDs and parents tell us their children love to watch them again and again while learning something new each time. this 45 minute Interactive DVD features live action and real children introducing shapes and colors. Teaches 12 Shapes and 12 Colors using everyday objects in familiar surroundings to help make fast learning connections. Your child will hear lively music with a gentle, instructional voice describing what your child is seeing. Video uses the teach repeat review method throughout.
response.tagline: Brainy Baby Teach Your Child Shapes & Colors: Rainbows, Circles and Squares Oh My!
response.title: Brainy Baby: Shapes and Colors
